name: Before I Forget (itch) (mcreek)
description:
Did you remember to turn off the lights?  Blow out the candle?  Water your plants? Grab your keys?  Drink water?  Eat breakfast?

No??  Well, me neither. 

That's okay-- let's try again tomorrow.

-----

Sometimes, remembering the little things is hard.  Especially when you have ADHD.  This is a game about memory, routine, and celebrating small wins.

Inspired by a true story known as my everyday inability to remember stuff.  And also that one time those two times I left the stove on.
